author: Krutak
title: A great expension
review:
71396 Bowser Jr.'s Clown car is the smallest set of 4th wave which launched in winter of 2022.

The build features a clown car and a 4x4 rounded green plate with a flower on it, on which sits a Bob-omb. Bob-omb is standard, no new pieces.

The Clown car is built using some interesting techniques. You can fly, stomp enemies, and earn coins! The Clown car has it's music, which is very cool to listen.

Overall, 71396 Bowser Jr.'s Clown car is a nice set and expansion to your Lego Super Mario world.
